d:
Release 365. A Kind Degenerate soul was able to provide me a lot of John K Peta raws with less censoring that what was currently available. Some of the raws just had less black bars, some had bars instead of mosaics, and a few were uncensored.

And because I had these, I've decided to fix some cosmic injustices and release proper translations for some things that were MTL/AI translated in the past.

TO BE CLEAR, this is only happening because I had access to better raws, I would normally not re-release something that already had a TL no matter how bad it is. My dollars are limited and I can't spend them on doing a re-release. I don't want any MTL/AI translators thinking that they're "Drawing attention" to things by releasing an MTL. The community's consensus is on point, an MTL being released will 99% of the time guarantee no proper release ever sees the light of day. This is just the outlier.

Also, flat chested dark skinned Tomboy was immediately attention catching for me, but as the story progressed, this one lost me.

Discord
https://discord.gg/7w4vywM95P
n: [Manga] [John K. Pe-ta] Inaka de hameyou | Letâ€™s Do It in the Countryside [English] [Decensored] [Castle TL] [Digital]
